program.name: pygments
program.install:
_pyexe=python [ -x ${SB_VAR_PYTHON}/bin/python3 ] && _pyexe=python3
PYTHONPATH="${SB_VAR_SETUPTOOLS}/lib/${_pysubdir}" \ ${SB_VAR_PYTHON}/bin/${_pyexe} setup.py install -O1 \ --skip-build --single-version-externally-managed --root / \ --install-lib=${_install_prefix} \ --prefix=${_binman_prefix-${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}}
# replace binary and install documentation if [ "${_binman_prefix+set}" != set ]; then ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 pygmentize \ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/pygmentize ${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ 1s|^.*|#!${SB_VAR_PYTHON}/bin/${_pyexe}|;\ s!@libdir@!${_install_prefix}!;" \ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/pygmentize
${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d ${_docdir}/html ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 644 -o root -g 0 \ ${SB_BUILD_PREFIX}/docs/build/* ${_docdir}/html
${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man/man1 ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 644 -o root -g 0 \ ${SB_BUILD_PREFIX}/docs/pygmentize.1 ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man/man1 ${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ s!/usr/share/doc/python-pygments!${_docdir}/html!g;" \ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man/man1/pygmentize.1 fi
# install path for Python's include.paths.d ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d \ ${_install_prefix}/include.paths.d cat >${_install_prefix}/include.paths.d/99-${SB_PROG_NAME} <<_EOT_ ${_install_prefix} _EOT_
